name: @cucumber/messages
description: JSON schema-based messages for Cucumber's inter-process communication
author: Cucumber Limited <cukes@googlegroups.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.copy-schemas: shx rm -rf ./schema/*.json && shx cp ../jsonschema/src/*.json ./schema && shx cp ../jsonschema/messages.schema.json ./messages.schema.json
scripts.version: shx echo "// This file is automatically generated using npm scripts" > src/version.ts && echo "export const version = '${npm_package_version}'" >> src/version.ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run copy-schemas
